docs.snippet: That the United States capped Friday with a victory over China to advance to the semifinals at the Women's World Cup had special meaning for forward Abby Wambach....
docs.lead_paragraph: That the United States capped Friday with a victory over China to advance to the semifinals at the Women's World Cup had special meaning for forward Abby Wambach.

headline.main: Wambach Says US Win Caps Historic Gay Marriage Day

docs.snippet: The feud between the Spanish tennis federation and top players over Gala Leon's appointment as the nation's first female Davis Cup captain is damaging for the sport and could deter sponsors, Rafa Nadal said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The feud between the Spanish tennis federation and top players over Gala Leon's appointment as the nation's first female Davis Cup captain is damaging for the sport and could deter sponsors, Rafa Nadal said on Saturday.

headline.main: Feud Over Female Davis Cup Captain Damaging, Nadal Says
headline.print_headline: Feud Over Female Davis Cup Captain Damaging, Nadal Says

docs.snippet: South America's football federation might try to annul its contract with Datisa if the sports marketing company cannot meet its obligations for the current Copa America and the next three editions of the tournament, the federation's treasurer said...
docs.lead_paragraph: South America's football federation might try to annul its contract with Datisa if the sports marketing company cannot meet its obligations for the current Copa America and the next three editions of the tournament, the federation's treasurer said.

headline.main: South America Football May End Marketing Deal Due to U.S. Probe
headline.print_headline: South America Football May End Marketing Deal Due to U.S. Probe

docs.snippet: Roddick, 32, who retired from tennis in 2012, spoke about living with the knowledge that he “could still be out there” and his coming assignment with the BBC at Wimbledon....

docs.snippet: The desire to strengthen family ties leads some grandparents who have free time and adequate financial resources to relocate to be closer to their grandchildren....
docs.lead_paragraph: The desire to strengthen family ties leads some grandparents who have free time and adequate financial resources to relocate to be closer to their grandchildren.
docs.abstract: Many grandparents feel desire to move closer to their grandchildren in retirement, but advisability of decision depends on a number of financial factors.

headline.main: Grandparents Who Move to Be Closer to Grandchildren
headline.print_headline: Pulling Up Stakes to Be Near the Grandchildren
